item.title: 降息希望升温，美国股票基金每周吸引资金流入
item.description: 截至8月13日的一周内，美国股票基金获得了大量资金流入，原因是投资者扭转了因美联储可能在9月份降息的希望而抛售股票的立场，同时中美关税休战进一步提振了市场情绪。【原文：U.S. equity funds gained substantial inflows in the week through August 13 as investors reversed a selling stance on hopes of a potential Federal Reserve rate cut in September, while a U.S.-China tariff truce further lifted sentiment.】

item.title: 大多数经济学家表示，美国联邦储备委员会将在 9 月降息，并在今年再降息一次：路透社民意调查
item.description: 在对全球最大经济体健康状况的担忧日益加剧之际，路透社调查的大多数经济学家的基本预测仍然是，美联储将在 9 月份降息，这是今年的首次降息，随后可能在年底前再次降息。【原文：A Federal Reserve interest rate cut in September, the first this year, followed perhaps by another before year-end remains the base forecast for most economists polled by Reuters amid rising concerns about the health of the world's biggest economy.】

item.title: 早间新闻加息热潮退去，阿拉斯加成为焦点
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据天空新闻报道，贾里德-库什纳的公司购买了英国贷款公司 OakNorth 8%的股份
item.description: 据天空新闻周五援引业内消息人士的话报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的女婿贾里德-库什纳（Jared Kushner）创办的私募股权公司 Affinity Partners 已签署协议，收购英国贷款公司 OakNorth 8%的股份。【原文：Affinity Partners, a private equity firm founded by U.S. President Donald Trump's son-in-law Jared Kushner, has signed a deal to buy an 8% stake in British lender OakNorth, Sky News reported on Friday, citing industry sources.】

item.title: 受降息预期影响，标普 500 指数和道指期货攀升；联合健康跳涨
item.description: 受 9 月降息预期支撑，周五道指和 S&P 500 指数期货走高；伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）增持联合健康保险公司（UnitedHealth）股份后，该公司股价大涨。【原文：Futures tracking the Dow and the S&P 500 were higher on Friday, underpinned by expectations of an interest rate cut in September, while UnitedHealth surged after Berkshire Hathaway raised its stake in the health insurer.】

item.title: 特朗普对高盛的攻击可能促使华尔街的独立分析被淡化
item.description: 投资者和学术界人士表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对高盛（Goldman Sachs）关税风险研究的批评可能会促使一些分析师淡化他们的研究，这一结果可能会使投资者获得的信息更不可靠。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's criticism of Goldman Sachs' research on tariff risks could prompt some analysts to water down their research, investors and academics said, an outcome that could leave investors with less reliable information.】

item.title: T1 与康宁达成协议，生产全美国制造的太阳能电池板
item.description: 美国太阳能公司 T1 Energy 和特种玻璃制造商康宁周五表示，双方已达成一项协议，将建立一个完全国产化的太阳能供应链，将在美国生产的多晶硅、硅片、电池和电池板连接起来。【原文：U.S. solar company T1 Energy and specialty glass maker Corning have reached a deal that will establish a fully domestic solar supply chain, connecting polysilicon, wafers, cells, and panels manufactured in the United States, they said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国通胀疲软，关税休战，全球股票基金流入量创六周新高
item.description: 截至8月13日的一周，全球股票基金创下六周来最大单周流入量，原因是美国通胀数据低于预期，以及中美延长关税休战期提振了投资者情绪。【原文：Global equity funds logged their largest weekly inflows in six weeks in the week to August 13, lifted by a softer-than-expected U.S. inflation print and an extension of a tariff truce between the United States and China which boosted investor sentiment.】

item.title: 中国蚂蚁金服集团称 "灵通智能 "交易正按计划进行，此前有报道称该交易被推迟
item.description: 有报道称，中国蚂蚁金服集团收购光明智能证券与大宗商品集团的相关程序正在按计划推进，该报道回应称，该交易可能面临更严格的监管审查，并可能被推迟。【原文：China's Ant Group said relevant procedures regarding its acquisition of Bright Smart Securities & Commodities Group are moving forward as planned, in response to a report that said the deal may face higher regulatory scrutiny and could be delayed.】

item.title: 科技出口强劲，台湾上调 2025 年 GDP 增长预期至 4.45
item.description: 台湾统计机构周五表示，随着科技和人工智能相关产品需求旺盛，台湾经济在2025年的增长速度有望超过此前的预测。【原文：Taiwan's economy is expected to grow faster in 2025 than previously forecast, the statistics agency said on Friday, as the island continues to reap the benefits of strong demand for tech and artificial intelligence-related products.】

item.title: Kyivstar 首席执行官称俄乌和平协议将提升在美上市后的价值
item.description: 乌克兰移动运营商 Kyivstar 首席执行官 Oleksandr Komarov 周五在该公司纽约上市前表示，俄乌战争的和平解决将 "极大地 "提升该公司的价值。【原文：A peaceful resolution to the war between Russia and Ukraine would boost the value of Ukrainian mobile operator Kyivstar "quite significantly", its CEO Oleksandr Komarov said on Friday ahead of the company's New York listing.】

item.title: 俄罗斯的乌克兰战争如何影响全球市场？
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京周五晚些时候将在阿拉斯加会晤，以达成一项可能的乌克兰停火协议，世界市场对此密切关注。【原文：World markets are watching closely as U.S. President Donald Trump and Russia's Vladimir Putin meet in Alaska later on Friday to seal a possible ceasefire agreement in Ukraine.】

item.title: 应用材料公司股价因中国需求疲软和关税风险而下挫
item.description: 芯片设备制造商应用材料公司因中国需求低迷发布了疲软的第四季度业绩预期，加剧了市场对关税相关风险的担忧，周五该公司股价在盘前交易中暴跌近14%。【原文：Shares of Applied Materials tumbled nearly 14% in premarket trading on Friday after the chip equipment maker issued weak fourth-quarter forecasts on sluggish China demand, fueling concerns over tariff-related risks.】

item.title: 英国天然气公司所有者 Centrica 与美国德文能源公司达成天然气交易
item.description: 英国天然气公司（British Gas）的所有者 Centrica 周五表示，它已与德文能源公司（Devon Energy）签订了一项天然气协议，该美国公司将在自 2028 年起的 10 年内每年供应相当于五船液化天然气的天然气。【原文：British Gas owner Centrica said on Friday it has entered into a natural gas agreement with Devon Energy , in which the U.S.-based firm will supply an equivalent to five LNG cargoes per year over a 10-year term from 2028.】

item.title: 伯克希尔哈撒韦公司收购新股份后，联合健康跳涨
item.description: 周五，在沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）透露对联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）的新投资后，该公司股价在盘前交易中大涨超过 12%。【原文：Shares of UnitedHealth Group surged more than 12% in premarket trading on Friday after Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway revealed a new investment in the health insurer.】

item.title: 英特尔法兰克福上市股票在报道美国可能入股芯片制造商后上涨 3.6
item.description: 英特尔在法兰克福上市的股票周五上涨了 3.6%，此前一天彭博新闻社报道称，特朗普政府正在与这家陷入困境的芯片制造商谈判，希望美国政府能入股该公司。【原文：Intel's Frankfurt-listed shares rose 3.6% on Friday, a day after Bloomberg News reported the Trump administration is in talks with the struggling chipmaker to have the U.S. government potentially take a stake in the company.】

item.title: 软银的 PayPay 申请在美国上市
item.description: 软银周五表示，支付应用运营商 PayPay Corp 已申请在美国上市美国存托股票。【原文：SoftBank said on Friday that payments app operator PayPay Corp has applied to list American depositary shares in the United States.】

item.title: 五点钟方向北上阿拉斯加，大家期待已久的会议
item.description: 目前似乎没有什么阻碍股市多头的因素，但在阿拉斯加举行的具有里程碑意义的美俄峰会、怀俄明州的央行shin-dig会议和玻利维亚的选举等，可能会让他们变得谨慎一些。【原文：There seems to be very little standing in the way of stock-market bulls right now, but a landmark U.S./Russia summit in Alaska, a central bank shin-dig in Wyoming and elections in Bolivia, among other things, may imbue them with some caution.】

item.title: 欧洲销售疲软导致珠宝制造商潘多拉股价暴跌
item.description: 丹麦珠宝制造商潘多拉（Pandora）周五股价暴跌，因为该公司指出其主要欧洲市场销售疲软，而美国市场的强劲销售仅部分抵消了这一影响。【原文：Shares in Danish jewellery maker Pandora plummeted on Friday after the company flagged weakening sales in its key European markets, only partially offset by robust sales in the United States.】

item.title: 埃森哲将收购澳大利亚公司 CyberCX，这是埃森哲有史以来最大的一笔网络交易
item.description: 埃森哲周四表示，将收购澳大利亚网络安全公司 CyberCX，这是该公司在网络安全领域有史以来最大的一笔交易，《澳大利亚金融评论报》对这笔交易的估值超过 10 亿澳元（约合 6.5 亿美元）。【原文：Accenture said on Thursday it will buy Australian cybersecurity firm CyberCX in its largest-ever deal in the sector, with the Australian Financial Review valuing the transaction at more than A$1 billion ($650 million).】

item.title: 早间投标谁会害怕炙手可热的 PPI？
item.description: 格雷戈尔-斯图尔特-亨特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Gregor Stuart Hunter】

item.title: 强大的新人工智能模型让欧洲采用人工智能技术的公司股票大跌眼镜
item.description: 本周，拥抱人工智能的欧洲公司股价跌势加剧，因为强大的新人工智能模型引发了从软件到数据分析等行业是否会被人工智能技术超越的问题。【原文：A rout in shares of European companies embracing artificial intelligence deepened this week, as powerful new AI models raise questions about whether sectors from software to data analytics could find themselves overtaken by the technology.】

item.title: 加拿大航空公司与工会发生冲突，尽管政府请求达成协议以避免周六罢工
item.description: 尽管政府呼吁双方回到谈判桌上，以避免一场会影响数万名乘客出行的罢工，但加拿大航空公司和其工会空乘人员周五仍各执一词。【原文：Air Canada and its unionized flight attendants remained at odds on Friday, despite government pleas for both sides to return to bargaining to avert a strike that would upend travel for tens of thousands of passengers.】

item.title: California Coastal Commission opposes SpaceX launch expansion on West Coast, again
item.description: 加利福尼亚州海岸委员会周四投票反对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司的一项计划，即允许该公司每年从范登堡空军基地发射猎鹰 9 号火箭的次数增加近一倍，从 50 次增加到 95 次。【原文：The California Coastal Commission voted on Thursday against a plan by Elon Musk's SpaceX to nearly double the number of Falcon 9 rocket launches the company is permitted to conduct each year from Vandenberg Space Force Base, from 50 to 95.】

item.title: 财政部长称日本必须关注经济背景以应对日本央行加息呼声
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信周五表示，政府必须密切关注近期商界呼吁央行加息背后的经济和价格背景。【原文：Japan's Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said on Friday the government must closely watch the economic and price backdrop behind recent business sector calls for the central bank to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 中国举办 "机器人奥运会"，来自 16 个国家的人形机器人参加乒乓球、足球和田径比赛
item.description: 周五，中国拉开了为期三天的仿人机器人体育展示活动的序幕，来自 16 个国家的 280 支队伍参加了世界仿人机器人运动会，希望借此彰显人工智能和机器人技术的进步。【原文：China kicked off a three-day long sports showcase for humanoid robots on Friday, looking to highlight progress in artificial intelligence and robotics with 280 teams from 16 countries competing in the World Humanoid Robot Games.】

item.title: 中国 7 月工厂产出和零售额增速下滑，经济势头受挫
item.description: 7 月份，中国工厂产出增长降至八个月来的最低点，零售销售也大幅放缓，这加剧了政策制定者在国内需求疲软和外部风险面前努力支撑经济所面临的挑战。【原文：China's factory output growth slumped to an eight month low in July, while retail sales also slowed sharply, reinforcing the challenge confronting policymakers as they strive to shore up an economy in the face of soft demand at home and external risks.】

item.title: 美联储降息呼声减弱，PPI数据靓丽，亚洲市场跌跌不休
item.description: 由于生产者价格通胀高于预期，抑制了美联储在 9 月份会议上大幅降息的预期，同时美国债券和股票期货企稳，亚洲股市出现了不均衡的复苏。【原文：Stocks in Asia made an uneven recovery as higher-than-expected producer price inflation dampened expectations of a jumbo rate cut at the Federal Reserve's September meeting, while U.S. bonds and equity futures stabilised.】

item.title: 中国 7 月份工厂产出和零售销售增长均不及预期
item.description: 周五的官方数据显示，中国 7 月份工业产值同比增长 5.7%，与 6 月份的 6.8%相比有所放缓，低于预期；零售额增速也有所放缓。【原文：China's industrial output grew 5.7% year-on-year in July, slowing from the 6.8% rise in June and missing forecasts, while retail sales also grew at a slower clip, official data showed on Friday.】

item.title: 中国 1-7 月房地产投资同比下降 12
item.description: 周五的官方数据显示，继上半年下降11.2%之后，今年前七个月中国房地产投资同比下降12.0%。【原文：Property investment in China declined 12.0% in the first seven months of the year from the same period last year, after dropping 11.2% in the first half, official data showed on Friday.】
